Settings.LogFolder: Value '..\Logs' : Path relative to the script. Value 'C:\MyApp\Logs' : An absolute path. Value NULL : Create no log file.
Settings.LogFileExtension: Value '.xlsx' : Create an Excel log file. Value '.txt' : Create a text log file. Value '.csv' : Create a comma separated log file. The value is ignored when LogFolder is NULL.
Settings.LogToEventLog: Value TRUE : Log verbose to event log. Value FALSE : Do not log messages to the event log.
